branchCategory.name: TID
branchCategory.description: TD/TID series is a highly flexible fluorine resin tubing that was designed for installation in small spaces. The denatured PTFE fluorine resin tubing was developed to realize high flexibility, while maintaining the same heat and chemical resistance as the series, TL/TH. TD/TID series is suitable for industries that require heat and chemical resistance and conforms to Food Sanitation Law.

branchItem.name: TID, Inch Size Soft Fluoropolymer Tubing
branchItem.description: TD/TID series is a highly flexible fluorine resin tubing that was designed for installation in small spaces. The denatured PTFE fluorine resin tubing was developed to realize high flexibility, while maintaining the same heat and chemical resistance as the series, TL/TH. TD/TID series is suitable for industries that require heat and chemical resistance and conforms to Food Sanitation Law.
